subject: Re: Haven Website Updates | Quotation required
preview: Hi Rosemary, Great, appreciate the update. Please let me know if there are any further tweaks.

full_threads.body:
Hi Rosemary, 

Great, appreciate the update. Please let me know if there are any further tweaks.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for the update, I can see the changes are live. 😊

Thanks,

Rosemary

Hi @ricaR @manuel many thanks for the assist on this task, in true Mayo Hardware fashion, we had some sizeable updates to complete, which were made easier by Rosemary's detailed instructions.

A great result!

I did want to mention that our time tracking on this task could have been better. Heath provided the CX with a time estimate and it would have been great to know if that was accurate.

I have estimated time used at 8 hours, this allows for video calls, clarifications and updates that come along with these tasks.

@heath FYI.

Hi Chris,

Thanks for that. All good, appreciate your assistance on this small project.

Thanks,

Rosemary

Confirming the changes are now on the live domain: https://haveninspired.com.au/

In the event you don't see the updates, please try an incognito browser and/or clearing your cache.
